item.description:
You are invited to our CW and Swing Dance Singles Meet Up party every Sunday evening at The Nathaniel Silsbee Mansion Knights of Columbus Hall in Salem, Mass. The doors open at 7 pm to 11 pm for an evening of dance and adventure. Possibly meet up with a special dance partner. An air conditioned 4,000 sq. ft. dance hall is available to our group of 300+ dancers. Casual attire, hats and jeans are OK and the admission is $10. Students half price with a valid school ID. The first 75 dancers before 7pm will enter free of charge. Get here early it pays. Also a 2 for 1 admission special till 8 pm. Parking is available in the rear of the building and around the Salem Common. Beginner dance lessons start at 7:15 pm with Shana Ross. Bring Lots of your favorite friends there is room for many hundreds of dancers and spectators. Don't miss out of this great action packed party night of CW and Swing Dancing. Hope to see you at our next CW and Swing Dance Singles Meet Up.

Country Western line and Partner Dance, West and East Coast Swing, Waltz, Cha Cha, Carabin and More.
item.name: Aspire, "Country Western & Swing Dance" Singles Meet Up
